modules.description: This module implements a server-side networking interface for handling I/O operations on a connection. It provides functions to read from and write to a stream, manage protocol upgrades, and handle exceptions, working with types like `Bigstringaf.t` and `Faraday.iovec`. It is used to build network servers that process requests and responses over a streaming I/O interface.

This module manages bidirectional communication over a connection using bigstrings for efficient data handling. It provides methods to inspect and perform read/write operations, including yielding control to external handlers, reporting results, and handling shutdowns. Concrete use cases include implementing custom network protocols, managing streaming data transfers, and handling asynchronous I/O with precise control over buffering and execution flow.

This module manages a buffer with operations to create, read from, and write to a `Bigstringaf.t`-based structure. It supports efficient data handling by allowing direct manipulation of the underlying bigstring with customizable read and write functions. Concrete use cases include network communication and binary data processing where precise control over memory buffers is required.

This module implements low-level networking and buffer management for streaming I/O operations. It provides functions to handle bidirectional communication, protocol upgrades, and direct bigstring manipulation, working with types like `Bigstringaf.t` and `Faraday.iovec`. Use it to build custom network servers, manage streaming data transfers, and handle asynchronous I/O with fine-grained control over buffering and execution flow.
